blog.description:
I mostly reblog things and rant about stuff. Also I write sometimes. And I'm nice. on good days.

For those of you on mobile, here are the links you can't see on my pretty blog:
Commissions
What Am I Doing?
Community Writer's Blog
Discord Server

Now Buy Me a Coffee if you appreciate my efforts! ("Coffee" is metaphorical. Coffee is college savings, or savings for my Dream Pride Outfit if you want to bring us closer to pics of me wearing it.)

summary: There was a quintessential scene in my dream last night where I had to climb through a window—you know, like one of those...
body:
There was a quintessential scene in my dream last night where I had to climb through a window—you know, like one of those windows by the ceiling, like a basement window at ground level—after this random dude, and I was pulling myself up going like “oh geez it’s been a while since I had to do this.” So he offered to help, but I went like “no no I’m fine, I’ve done this a lot, it’s just been a while.”

So in this dream, I have WICKED upper body strength, because I’m lifting 180 pounds of nonsense and me with just my forearms and wrists, until finally I’m out, and the guy gawks at me cuz my dream has decided he’s the Flustered Type.

So

Here we are, in a kinda closed off alleyway during the apocalypse. See what happened was some aliens came down and enslaved humanity. This theme stayed consistent throughout the entire dream, which is interesting because usually something weird changes at the end, but nah. It just goes from “they’ve blasted the earth with toxins” to “they think humans are a natural slave species and are happy to be here.” I guess a lot of times passes.

But right now, in this moment, we’re on the run. I can’t remember if this is before or after finding David Tennant in a rundown apartment with Sadie Miller, but me and this guy are kind of alone for a minute. We’re waiting for someone, not sure what, so we stop and chat. The conversation goes to his shirt, because he’s wearing a shirt that looks like my favorite shirt. He’s kinda tall, so I’m wondering what size it is. He’s like “oh uh, it’s… Disney? You know they don’t use numbers.”

“Okay but what does it say?” I ask. “I have the same shirt. I wanna know if yours is bigger.”

I don’t know why I want this information, but it feels important, and kind of like if mine IS bigger, it’s some kind of victory, despite the fact that I’m short and that would only be a tesriment to how big my boobs are.

Now, I have this pile of clothes here. My stuff ends up in a variety of places, possibly for apocalypse reasons, and right now I spot that same pattern on his shirt, so I pull it out and look for the size. But—oops—this is a jacket. Not the shirt! We have a laugh and try again. Ahhh, closer, but that one’s a hoodie. Basically, we bond over not being able to find my shirt, and in the end I’m like “man, I liked that shirt,” and the people we were waiting for get there.

There was also an intense plot point that I don’t think ever got resolved.

That was that, over time, this one guy started using his meager slave wages and tips to buy himself stuff. But he owed this one other guy money, and the other guy did not appreciate it. Actually, we kind of collectively needed that money, so what the fuck dude? You already stole that awesome multi-bladed tool when you tricked those drunk aliens into thinking they were hallucinating; why are you buying another one? We collect these things. Why are you wasting money?

That never came to a conclusion, unfortunately.

summary:
Imagine the Doctor telling you stories of past adventures, loving he can keep you interested.
"That really did not happen!" You...
body:
Imagine the Doctor telling you stories of past adventures, loving he can keep you interested.

“That really did not happen!” You laugh at the part in his story.

“Yes it did!” He tries defending, losing his storytelling face and laughing with you. Glad he could bring this smile to your face, even if you were telling him he was wrong.

Gifs are not mine, if you would like your credit for the gifs let me know and I’ll give credit!

blog.name: nerddad5000
blog.title: "My friends... the great experiment."
blog.description:
Hello world!!! My name is NerdDad5000. Father to nerdy children. Husband to a nerdy wife. Grew up on reruns of Star Trek, Doctor Who, and the Twilight Zone. Still watching those... the old and the new. Have always been a Batman, Superman, the original "Superfriends," and DC Comics fan. And now a fan of the mighty Marvel Cinematic Universe. 

On my channel you'll find trailer reactions, movie reviews, top 5 lists, videos from conventions we attend, and the occasional musings of a nerd dad. I also follow NASA missions and other science and nature related subjects. So expect videos of planets and space, lots of videos from Mars, of volcanoes here on Earth, and any other sciency stuff. There will also be sloths. 

DON'T FORGET TO LIKE, SUBSCRIBE, COMMENT AND SHARE!!!

LIKE ME ON FACEBOOK!!! https://www.facebook.com/NerdDad5000
FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER!!! https://twitter.com/NDad5000
FOLLOW ME ON INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/nerddad5000

In using their likeness and this video, I am in no way claiming any ownership or rights to any of the characters or stories. I mean, I don’t want to be erased from time and space. It’s their video. Not mine. The music in the opening and closing of this video is from the band “Yes,” it is from their fourth studio album entitled “Fragile” (1971), it was on the Atlantic Records label, and the name of the song is “Roundabout.” It was written by Jon Anderson and Steve Howe. In using this song, I am in no way claiming any ownership or rights to it. It is theirs.

blog.name: whovianfloozy
blog.title: The Whovian Floozy
blog.description:
My fandom name is Beachy, and this is a multi-fandom blog. 
I'm also a multi-shipper. It's likely I do not sail your ship, but I don't wank and expect visitors to play nicely as well. That includes not adding hate or negativity to my posts, altering them to suit your own ships, or removing my original comments. If you do, you will be blocked.
IRL they call me Doctor. Yep, I'm that old. Sometimes I write things that other people watch. It's all good! I like mocha latte with bourbon. A lot.

blog.description: Max || female || BI || Gryffindor || DC and MARVEL || sci-fi || The Arrowverse, Supernatural, The 100, Stranger Things, Doctor Who, The Umbrella Academy, Shameless, Brooklyn 99, One Day at a Time, the Good Place, Santa Clarita Diet, New Girl, Sex Education, Harry Potter, IT, Love Simon, and any Marvel/DC movies/shows are all regularly posted about on this blog. Masterlist

summary: You know when your binging a show but you know your getting to the end of a certain part you love but you wanna continue...
body: You know when your binging a show but you know your getting to the end of a certain part you love but you wanna continue watching soooo bad but you know if you watch to quickly it will be over faster???
